title: Cairo Quran Radio
description: The Official Website of the Quran Radio in Cairo, that is offering the ability to listen to Quran Radio, also allowing users to read the Quran as text and much more. Built Live Radio with auto-updating program schedule based on Cairo Time Zone. Created audio programs, episodes, and Quran recordings listing and details pages. Built a global sticky audio player used across the entire platform. Built a full admin system for CRUD operations: audio files, recordings, programs, and live radio paragraphs.

title: CPA - Customer Protection Agency
description: The Official Website of National Customer Protection Agency that enable citizens to electronically submit and track complaints regarding unfair trade practices and product safety concerns. Built the entire project from scratch including full authentication, authorization, and profile management. Built multi-step complain submission form with validation, listing, and detailed pages with date range and complain number filtering. Allowed users to upload files and receive documents or comments request notifications from CPA staff. Built informative agency pages, media center, newsletter and much more, ensured a clean and responsive UI.

title: MCIT - Ministry of Communication & Information Technology
description: The Official Website of the Ministry of Communication and Information Technology, that will be available for both public users and internal Employees. Created a global Print Specific Section utility that Prints only required parts of details pages and Excludes irrelevant content.
